description: This file defines two data models, MemoryRow and SummaryRow, using Pydantic for validation and serialization. These models are designed to represent database rows for memory and session summaries, including automatic ID generation and conversion to dictionary format.

classes.name: MemoryRow
classes.description: Represents a memory record stored in the database, with fields for id, memory content, user id, and last updated timestamp.

classes.name: SummaryRow
classes.description: Represents a session summary record stored in the database, with fields for id, summary content, user id, and last updated timestamp.

methods.name: generate_id
methods.description: Automatically generates a UUID for the record if the id is not provided, used after model validation.

methods.name: to_dict
methods.description: Converts the model instance into a dictionary, excluding the 'last_updated' field and formatting it as ISO string if present.
